trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway wants to spread the joy of music.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ridingway.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_TODO_01<tab>Ride the moon-hopper to the Carrotorium and perform the hop-step at the designated locations.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_TODO_02<tab>Report to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Ever since we built the musicking station, many Ways have developed a liking for music.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>Many more, however, remain unaware of the station's pleasures, and I would like you to help spread the word.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>If you're willing, please report to Ridingway yonder. He has charge of the advertising effort, and will provide you with instructions.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_RIDINGWAY_000_010<tab>Ah, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Here to help us advertise the musicking station, yes?
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_RIDINGWAY_000_011<tab>There isn't anything to it, really. You just need to play a spot of music for some Ways out there.

TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_RIDINGWAY_000_012<tab>Without further ado, ride this moon-hopper over to the Carrotorium. Once there, use its hop-step function near a crowd. The feel-good sound it produces is bound to put a spring in our fellows' steps!

TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_RIDINGWAY_000_020<tab>Ride the moon-hopper over to the Carrotorium, and use its hop-step function near a crowd. The feel-good sound it produces is bound to put a spring in our fellows' steps!
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Some Loporrits have gathered here. Speak with Ridingway in Hoper's Hold to mount the moon-hopper, then perform the hop-step in their midst.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_030<tab>(-Playful Loporrit-)Ooh, what agreeable, uplifting music! I can't help but want to rollick!
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_031<tab>(-Playful Loporrit-)We can enjoy such feel-good sounds any time at this musicking station, you say? Thank you, we'll head there at once!
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_032<tab>(-Playful Loporrit-)Oho, if it isn't the feel-good sounds of the musicking station! Such a wonderful place that was!
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_033<tab>(-Playful Loporrit-)It's been too long since my last visit. I'll quickly finish up my work, then head over there again and hop till I drop!
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_040<tab>(-Languid Loporrit-)M-My tail and ears, they move as if they possessed a mind of their own... What in creation was that joyful sound?
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_041<tab>(-Languid Loporrit-)The musicking station... I never knew such a marvelous place existed. I'll pay a visit as soon as I can.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_042<tab>(-Languid Loporrit-)Oh, there it is again, the sound that makes my tail and ears want to dance...
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_LOPORRIT4694_000_043<tab>(-Languid Loporrit-)I must say, I was quite impressed with the musicking station, with its animated atmosphere. I must pay another visit after work.

TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_MANAGINGWAY_000_050<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. My colleagues at the musicking station are pleased to report a measurable increase in guests.
TEXT_BANLOP108_04694_MANAGINGWAY_000_051<tab>This is no doubt due to your efforts. We hope to advertise the facility on a regular basis, and when next we do so, I trust we can depend on you again.
